refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the error code for the most recent function call

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The maxdb_errno function will return the last error code for the most recent MaxDB function call that can succeed or fail with respect to the database link defined by the link parameter. If no errors have occured, this function will return zero.

refsect1.title: Return values
refsect1.para: An error code value for the last call, if it failed. zero means no error occurred.

refsect1.title: Example

example.title: Procedural style
example.programlisting:
<?php
$link = maxdb_connect("localhost", "MONA", "RED");

/* check connection */
if (maxdb_connect_errno()) {
   printf("Connect failed: %s\n", maxdb_connect_error());
   exit();
}

if (!maxdb_query($link, "SELECT xxx FROM hotel.city")) {
   printf("Errorcode: %d\n", maxdb_errno($link));
}

/* close connection */
maxdb_close($link);
?>

refsect1.para: The above examples would produce the following output:
refsect1.screen: PHP Warning: maxdb_query(): -4005 POS(8) Unknown column name:XXX [42000] <...> Errorcode: -4005
